BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears dense, with a heterogeneous distribution of glandular and fibroglandular tissues.
FINDINGS: There is an oval-shaped opacity seen in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. It measures approximately 10mm in diameter and has a well-circumscribed margin. The density and shape are suggestive of a benign fibroadenoma. However, short-term follow-up is recommended to confirm stability.
